ygData.subject: Re: Hunting Grounds
ygData.msgSnippet: And what is your characters name so that I can make sure that I don t help when I see you online.  This is supposed to be a forum to help each other, not brag
ygData.messageBody:
And what is your characters name so that I can make sure that I don't help
when I see you online. This is supposed to be a forum to help each other,
not brag about what you can pick up in one night and then follow up with a
"but I don't plan on telling anybody how".

Arathorne, Solsek Ro


>From: "Michael Wooldirdge" <mike@...>
>Reply-To: warriors_eq@onelist.com
>To: <warriors_eq@onelist.com>
>Subject: Re: [warriors_eq] Hunting Grounds
>Date: Mon, 28 Jun 1999 04:22:10 -0400
>
>I have a couple hunting grounds although some of them aren't really well
>known and I don't plan on telling anybody. On a very good day I can rake in
>200pp but that's my best day and that's a full 8 hours of game time. It
>really isn't hard to gain money past level 20.
